speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And VA Choice, they thought -- for many, many decades they'd been trying to get VA Choice.
politifact_statement: For many, many decades theyd been trying to get VA Choice. You couldnt get it. ... Now these great veterans, if theres a big wait, they go outside, they go to a local doctor. We pay the bills. They get better. Everybody is happy. And we actually save a lot of money, if you can believe it. And I got that approved after 44 years of being unable to get it approved.
verified_claim: Says Republicans"just passed" the Veterans Choice program after 44 years of trying. "They've been trying to pass that one for many, many decades."
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump GOP just passed veteran's Choice after 44-year wait. Actually, it's 4 years old
